item.description:
This meetup is for dues paying members of Greater Worcester Humanists.

Each year the steering committee asks all those who are interested in getting involved to come to an open steering committee meeting.  We hope to talk about what people would like to see GWH do in the future, people you'd like to hear speak, and general meeting ideas for the group's future. Come armed with ideas and initiative.  If you would like to play a bigger role in GWH and what we do, please feel free to join us.

We will have pizza and drinks around 6pm, but feel free to come a little later if you can't make it.

Definitely RSVP if you will be joining us for pizza.

Sign up for our free newsletter!
item.name: GWH Future Directions
